name: XerxesYoungSuniiTalk
_source: speak;Sunii;You're trying to help me? Thank you so much, but...|You'd be safer not associating with me...
speak;XeconisYoung;Well we're kind of already involved so...|Not like we have much choice now.
speak;Sunii;Touching. However, my baby girl... I can't die here...|Though, dragging other kids into this...
speak;XeconisYoung;I'll have you know I'm not just a "kid".|Besides, who are these men? Clearly not normal bandits...
speak;Sunii;Please don't ask questions... You're better off not knowing.
speak;XeconisYoung;Is this just because I'm young?
speak;Sunii;Just... Go on with what you were doing.
speak;XeconisYoung;Fine, but I expect to be compensated with information when we're finished.
